experiences.name: Deep Learning code book
experiences.description: This is a complementary book that follows the chapters of Deep Learning by Ian Goodfellow, etc. I learned everything I know on the internet (some classes at uni where great, but I discover my pasion late), so this project is something I am working to give back to the community.

experiences.name: Book repository (Currently implementing this project to this webpage)
experiences.description: I love reading so this project is complementary to this webpage, it's a way to talk about the books that I read and what I think of them. In the future I want to create some sort of discussion place. Also you can recommend me a book :D

experiences.name: Tetris
experiences.description: This was my first try in game development and I use raylib library for the developement of it, this project was a cero investigation approach towards making tetris, thus making it in some sense simple and with ugly code, but I was learning :D
